name: Oma Care
headline: Get paid for taking care of your parents.
description: We are building the technical infrastructure to train and pay the 53M family caregivers in the US.

founders.name: Arianna Galbraith, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Oma Care. Previously MPH @ Columbia and Pharmacology & Medicine @ McGill. Former caregiver.

founders.name: James Galbraith, Founder
founders.description: Background in textile manufacturing (scaled a PPE business from 0 —> $24M ARR in 8 months) and software development @Amazon. Looking to deliver value at scale, starting in healthcare

generated_description:
**Oma Care: Empowering Family Caregivers**

Founded in 2024 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, Oma Care is on a mission to revolutionize how we think about caregiving. Their central philosophy? Get paid for taking care of your parents. This innovative approach targets the extensive network of family caregivers, numbering approximately 53 million in the U.S., by building a robust technical infrastructure that supports, trains, and compensates them for their invaluable work.

Based on the premise that caregiving is both a significant responsibility and often an underappreciated labor, Oma Care aims to reshape the caregiver experience. They provide an online platform that facilitates this connection between caregivers and compensation, ultimately promoting a healthier dynamic in family care.

With a compact team of just two employees, Oma Care is holding itself up to high standards, driven by its early backing from Y Combinator. Although specific partnership details are currently undisclosed, being affiliated with Y Combinator adds considerable weight to their credibility and potential for growth.

To summarize, Oma Care is carving out a space where caregiving is recognized and rewarded, offering an enticing invitation for family caregivers to join their waitlist and learn more about how they can support their loved ones while also gaining financial backing for their efforts. For more information, feel free to check out their website at [Oma Care](https://www.omacare.com).
